subtitle: Step One
title: Share the Job Description
paragraph: Describe the roles, responsibilities, must-have skills, required work experience, and budget.s

subtitle: Step Two
title: Matchmake and review
paragraph: Based on the job description shared, we'll match the best-fit profile/s and share within 48 business hours.

subtitle: Step Three
title: Shortlist & Interview
paragraph: You select suitable candidates, and we schedule interviews based on your availability.

subtitle: Step four
title: Onboard & Manage
paragraph: We'll sort all the legalities and assist you with smooth onboarding as well as managing the talent.
